tooltip.certificate.adopt.desc: Right click on an unowned pet to adopt them!
tooltip.certificate.release.desc: Right click on your pet to release ownership.
command.beckon.help: Use "x" for random. Also see /beckon help <base|eyes|white>
config.simplycats.title: Simply Cats Config
config.simplycats.command_beckon.tooltip: ONLY enable this if you know what you're doing. This command can and will corrupt your world if used incorrectly.
config.simplycats.name_tag_recipe.toolti: You can easily disable the name tag recipe added by this mod by setting this value to false.
config.simplycats.adopt_a_dog.tooltip: Disabling this will remove the villager trade to get a one-time-use pet carrier containing a dog.
config.simplycats.wander_area_limit.tool: When a cat's home is set, this is the distance in blocks they are allowed to roam.
config.simplycats.breeding_limit.tooltip: This number is used to limit cat breeding; if more than this amount of cats are nearby, automatic breeding will be disabled.
config.simplycats.kitten_mature_timer.to: Number of minecraft ticks before a kitten becomes an adult. Default is 7 full minecraft days.
config.simplycats.pregnancy_timer.toolti: Number of minecraft ticks before a pregnant cat will give birth. Default is 4 full minecraft days.
config.simplycats.heat_timer.tooltip: Number of minecraft ticks that a cat will be in heat. Default is 2 full minecraft days.
config.simplycats.heat_cooldown.tooltip: Number of minecraft ticks that a cat will not go into heat. Default is 16 full minecraft days.
config.simplycats.male_cooldown.tooltip: Number of minecraft ticks that a male cat will not try to breed after breeding once already. Default is 1/4th a minecraft day.
chat.info.fixed_female: This female is spayed! She cannot go into heat, mate, or give birth.
chat.info.fixed_male: This male is neutered! He cannot mate.
chat.info.pregnant: This female is pregnant. Ticks until birth:
chat.info.pregnant_heat: This cat is pregnant, but still in heat for:
chat.info.in_heat: This female is in heat. Ticks left:
chat.info.not_in_heat: This female is not in heat. Ticks until next heat:
chat.info.male: This is a male. Cooldown ticks left:
chat.info.release_usage: has been released of your ownership. Did you say goodbye?
chat.info.remove_home: Removed previously set home spot for
chat.info.set_home: 's new home spot has been set to
